question: Which of the following patronised scholars like Ghiyas Beg, Naqib Khan, and Niamatullah?
explanation: During the reign of Jahangir,Â  Abdul Hamid Lahori wrote Padshah Namah and Khafi Khan wrote Muntakhab-i-Lubab. Jahangir also patronised many learned scholars like Ghiyas Beg, Naqib Khan, and Niamatullah.
